channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Cracked and mildly hazardous paving slab outside 23 Bloomsbury St, 5th December
item.description:
Outside 22 Bloomsbury st. This has been the case for at least a year and has been reported on numerous occasions and fixmystreet claims it has been fixed, but it hasn’t! Please could it be fixed this time?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Bloomsbury Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 5th December
item.description:
Near to Haroldstone House
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bridge is still flooding easily. Build up of mud. 4 hours rain today and it is was backing up. For those of us living on the other side of the lane this is the only way out. There are times when it’s not possible to get kids to school., 5th December
item.description:
Under bridge on Manor Lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large potholes appearing again. Hard to see due to water on road., 5th December
item.description:
Near corner of road. Manor lane. There are multiple potholes, it would be good if someone could come out and assess the lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large unavoidable immortal pothole, 5th December
item.description:
Large pothole that keeps reappearing shortly after each repair. This is just after the crest in the hill heading north so hard to see and impossible to avoid with incoming traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet another flytip, 5th December
item.description:
Manchester way two days after my last report. Still no response about CCTV. Several items Inc BBQs chairs airers etc.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Swindon Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road is flooded during and after rain, 5th December
item.description:
Roadway and pavement opposite 1 Church Road always floods during moderate rain making the road and footpath hazardous. Footway opposite cannot be used when it rains. The drain is not clearing the water here and is blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Church Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drainge blocked and causing flooding, 5th December
item.description:
The drain on this bend is blocked and is causing contiual flooding, meaning the road is sometimes closed and impassable. It just needs unblocking.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Young tree on verge leaning badly, 5th December
item.description:
Opposite 5 Charlton Close, outside number 22.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Charlton Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bayshill Road potholes going dow the hill., 5th December
item.description:
Location is travelling down Bayshiil Road. Cheltenham. Just before the zebra crossing around the Ladies Collage. See photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham

potholes and road breaking up

item.title: Deep Potholes at Car Park Entrance (see details following), 5th December
item.description:
At entrance to carpark adjacent to Badhams Pharmacy, London Rd. Charlton Kings, there are two deep potholes, which are almost impossible to avoid. I would appreciate it if these could be repaired. This problem has existed for several months. If council not responsible for repair, can you contact whoever is. Thank you Graham Probert 92, Beeches Rd, Charlton Kings
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Overbury Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 5th December

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 5th December

item.title: Overflow drain is completely blocked, 5th December
item.description:
This drain ( adjacent to no52's vehicle access) is completely blocked and you can see where i was able to scrape out the very top level which comes up to metal grate. The recent downpour resulted in localised flooding, water pouring on the road and dispersing on properties. Overflows are full.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Albemarle Gate, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped waste in bags and items, 5th December
item.description:
This rubbish has been at the entrance of The Minster Heritage site for more than one month. Although other untidy bins have been dealt with by Burger King the presumablty fly tipped waste has not.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
